ComicInfo.Title: The New Ruler - Part 5 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: It's Judgment Day on Mars. Everything John Carter has achieved has lead him to this final confrontation with the cruel tyrant of the Martian north. But he's going to be so busy commanding his army he's not going to be able to rescue Dejah Thoris this time - she's going to have to rescue herself! And even if Carter is victorious, he has upset the ancient religion of Mars and smashed the red planet's eons-old customs. What will be his reward? The epic battle to unite all of Mars awaits you in Warlord of Mars #25: The Final Reward!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-10 11:45:32. [CVDB406994]
ComicInfo.Characters: Carthoris, Dejah Thoris, John Carter, Kantos Kan, Phaidor, Salensus Oll, Tars Tarkas, Thurid, Thuvia, Woola, Xodar
ComicInfo.Teams: Black Martians, Red Martians, Tharks, Therns, Thoats, White Martians, Yellow Martians
